post.body: She and I discussed possibly going, but we will see lol
You invited her... Julia Anderson...
For some reason the store we usually go to doesn't have iphones.. They say get an LG Vu, but I mean we could go to a diff store
Maybe I'll make an appearance with Julia later... Wouldn't that be awkward?
Nice name! :-)
You totally need to blog the phone thing. hahaha
I'm enjoying your blog, but it's distracting me from studying, so I will have to go back and read more at another time. :-)
Is there a video of that?
Oops, sorry. I went to the show. I just wasn't feeling them.
No problem! Thanks for following me back. I found you by searching "Bowling For Soup." Haha.
It's funny how they say "most people" use Twitter wrong when it is a social networking tool. I think majority rules here.
I think the people dictating the "right" way to use Twitter are just the bitter early adapters.
That show had the best crowd I have seen in Columbia in quite a while!
Soon you're gonna log on to ICQ and someone will actually IM you.
Seriously? Xanga? For real?
Psh, whatever. You copied my realization.
Yeah... definitely used to have some really great conversations on Plurk. It was so time consuming though.
Old blogs from high school are way too entertaining.
Hahaha I appeared in that search.
lol... sorry I wasn't clear.
lol I mean what would be better than "bromance" unless you mean leave it at "close guy friendship." No word...
Do you have any more original ideas?
What a good fact to know.
Funniest tweet i have read all day.
Opinion on Scary Movie 4?
lol, For some reason I got talked into seeing it when it came out in theaters. I absolutely hated it.
Warning: Extremely bad movie. lol
Why would you ever watch that Scary Movie 4?
haha whatever! My mom's pasta salad is the best! :)
Who?
My aunt is getting me a phone for Christmas (AT&T)... I have been looking at tons of phones, but I'm still not sure what I want.
Boo! Both of my friends that were going with me to The Whig tonight bailed. Lame!
Finally done with this semester. Can't wait for 2009 and a fresh start.
WTF!!!?!?!?!?!?!?! My econ text book is on Aplia, which just went down until 9 am--when my exam is.
Remembering how much I like "Hate (I Really Don't Like You)" by Plain White T's.
Trying to studying for my econ exam, but I can't stop thinking about the non-posted grades from all of my other classes.
I'm listening to Quietdrive's album "Deliverance" for the first time. I'm liking it a lot more than I thought I would.
I wonder if anyone has ever listened to a song on repeat for a 10+ hour car ride. Would it even be possible?
Yay wawa
Bored with packing... Time for a break.
Essential road trip music, anyone?
Got a ton of stuff to do tomorrow, including packing and getting an oil change before I drive up to PA on Tuesday.
Hahahaha. Remember when we all though Plurk was the new Twitter? I'm almost kind of sad it wasn't.
Royal flush. Oh my god.
Oh man... About to play Texas hold em at a bar with my dad
